precaution: If you feel pain, fatigue, or dizziness, please tell the system so that we can terminate the exercise for your safety. Stop if there is any pain.
instruction: Rest your elbow on the table.
Hold the scoop with the handle in your hand.
Turn the scoop so that your palm faces down towards the table.
Rotate your hand so that the back of your hand touches the table.
Repeat the rotation with the scoop once more, going palm down then palm up.
Take a break until you can begin again .
Repeat the exercise one more time. I will guide you through the steps.
